oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Majmūʻah : manuscript, [ca. 1643]
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: Bahāʼ al-Dīn Zādah, Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAlī al-Āqshahrī.
oai_dc:dc.dc:publisher: Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University Houghton Library, Harvard University
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 1. Ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah / Kınalızade (ff. 1v.-21 v.) -- 2. Fihrist ṭabaqāt aṣḥāb al-Imām al-Aʻẓam Abū Ḥanīfah (ff. 21v-23v.) -- 3. Ṭabaqāt al-Ḥanafīyah / Ibn Quṭlubughā, Rajab 1053 [1643] (ff. 23v.-55v) -- 4. Kitāb al-alfāẓ (ff. 56r-71r) -- 5. Beginning of a risālah by Bahāʼ al-Dīn Zādah Muṣṭafá ibn ʻAlī al-Āqshahrī (f. 71v) -- 6. A biographical dictionary, titled at the end "Tārīkh Ibn Khāllikān" (ff. 74v-97r) -- 7. Another biographical dictionary (ff. 97v-109r) -- 8. Ḥikāyāt (stories) (ff. 110v.-112v) -- 9. Biographical notes and excerpts (ff. 113r-116r).
Written in one column, 25 lines per page, in black rubricated in red. First two pages framed within triple black and golden lines. Marginal notes.
Ownership statement signed ʻAbd al-Ghanī al-Ghunaymī, 1248 AH [1832-3 AD].
MS Arab 411. Houghton Library, Harvard University.

oai_dc:dc.dc:title: مجموعة : مخطوطة، [ca. 1643]
oai_dc:dc.dc:contributor: بهاء الدين زاده، مصطفى بن علي الآقشهري.
ابن قطلوبغا، القاسم بن عبد الله، , 1399 or 1400-1474 or 1475
